contentrichtext.text: '''IPI''' is a [[three-letter abbreviation]] with multiple meanings, including: ;Indexes *[[International Prognostic Index]] is a medical tool used in [[oncology]] to predict the outcome of lymphoma patients. *[[Industrial Production Index]] is an economic indicator. *[[International Protein Index]] is a database covering information about the [[proteome]]s of humans, mice and other animals. *[[Integrated Pulmonary Index]] is a patient pulmonary index which uses information from capnography and pulse oximetry to provide a single value that describes the patientâ€™s respiratory status. ;Identifier *[[Interested Parties Information]] / IPI number (property rights management). ;Organizations *[[International Peace Institute]] is a research and policy development institution. *[[Image Permanence Institute]] is a non-profit organization dedicated to scientific research in the preservation of visual and other forms of recorded information. *[[Institute for Policy Innovation]] is a free-market conservative public policy think tank. *[[International Press Institute]] is a journalism organization. *[[inter-parliamentary institution]] - a type of [[parliamentary assembly]] ;Other *[[Intelligent Peripheral Interface]] is a technology for connecting storage devices to computers. *[[Inter-processor interrupt]] is a mechanism used between processors to maintain a sort of synchronization. *[[Inwald Personality Inventory]] is a personality test. *[[Income Protection Insurance]] is an insurance policy paying benefits to policyholders who are unable to work due to illness or accident. *[[Inland Port Intact]] A transportation term for the door to door service that ocean carriers offered for international intermodal containers. *[[Individually Prescribed Instruction]], a method of schooling centered on self-education. *[[International Parking Institute]] {{disambig}}
